alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 6:32PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jefferson County through 700 PM PDT... At 632 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Camp Sherman, or 17 miles southwest of Madras, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Warm Springs Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
